AccessKeyInfoBase.description: The access key directly from target resource properties, which target service is Azure Resource, such as Microsoft.Storage

permissions.description: Permissions of the accessKey. `Read` and `Write` are for Azure Cosmos DB and Azure App Configuration, `Listen`, `Send` and `Manage` are for Azure Event Hub and Azure Service Bus.

authMode.description: Optional. Indicates how to configure authentication. If optInAllAuth, service linker configures authentication such as enabling identity on source resource and granting RBAC roles. If optOutAllAuth, opt out authentication setup. Default is optInAllAuth.

AuthMode.description: Indicates how to apply the authentication configuration operations.

values.name: optInAllAuth
values.description: Default authentication configuration according to the authentication type.

values.name: optOutAllAuth
values.description: Skip all authentication configuration such as enabling managed identity and granting RBAC roles

AzureAppConfigProperties.description: The resource properties when type is Azure App Configuration

connectWithKubernetesExtension.description: True if connection enables app configuration kubernetes extension.

AzureKeyVaultProperties.description: The resource properties when type is Azure Key Vault

connectAsKubernetesCsiDriver.description: True if connect via Kubernetes CSI Driver.

AzureResource.description: The azure resource info when target service type is AzureResource

resourceProperties.description: The azure resource connection related properties.

ConfigurationInfo.description: The configuration information, used to generate configurations or save to applications

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation when Linker is updating or deleting

action.description: Indicates how to apply the connector operations, such as opt out network configuration, opt in configuration.

customizedKeys.description: Optional. A dictionary of default key name and customized key name mapping. If not specified, default key name will be used for generate configurations

daprProperties.description: Indicates some additional properties for dapr client type

additionalConfigurations.description: A dictionary of additional configurations to be added. Service will auto generate a set of basic configurations and this property is to full fill more customized configurations

additionalConnectionStringProperties.description: A dictionary of additional properties to be added in the end of connection string.

configurationStore.description: An option to store configuration into different place

required.description: Represent the configuration is required or not

ConfigurationNameResult.description: Configuration Name list which will be set based on different target resource, client type, auth type.

value.description: The ConfigurationNameItem items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ConfigurationNames.description: The configuration names which will be set based on specific target resource, client type, auth type.

targetService.description: The target service provider name and resource name.

clientType.description: The client type for configuration names.

secretType.description: Indicates where the secrets in configuration from. Used when secrets are from Keyvault.

names.description: The configuration names to be set in compute service environment.

ConfigurationResult.description: Configurations for source resource, include appSettings, connectionString and serviceBindings

configurations.description: The configuration properties for source resource.

ConfigurationStore.description: An option to store configuration into different place

appConfigurationId.description: The app configuration id to store configuration

ConfluentBootstrapServer.description: The service properties when target service type is ConfluentBootstrapServer

ConfluentSchemaRegistry.description: The service properties when target service type is ConfluentSchemaRegistry

CreateOrUpdateDryrunParameters.description: The dryrun parameters for creation or update a linker

secretStore.description: An option to store secret value in secure place

configurationInfo.description: The connection information consumed by applications, including secrets, connection strings.

DaprBindingComponentDirection.description: The direction supported by the dapr binding component

DaprConfigurationList.description: Dapr configuration list supported by Service Connector

value.description: The DaprConfigurationResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

targetType.description: Supported target resource type, extract from resource id, uppercase

daprProperties.description: Indicates some additional properties for dapr client type

DaprConfigurationResource.description: Represent one resource of the dapr configuration list

properties.description: The properties of the dapr configuration.

secretRef.description: The secret name where dapr could get value

description.description: The description of the metadata, returned from configuration api

required.description: The value indicating whether the metadata is required or not

DaprMetadataRequired.description: The value indicating whether the metadata is required or not

DaprProperties.description: Indicates some additional properties for dapr client type

secretStoreComponent.description: The name of a secret store dapr to retrieve secret

runtimeVersion.description: The runtime version supported by the properties

bindingComponentDirection.description: The direction supported by the dapr binding component

DeleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: The cleanup behavior to indicate whether clean up operation when resource is deleted or updated

DryrunActionName.description: The name of action for you dryrun job.

value.description: The DryrunResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DryrunOperationPreview.description: The preview of the operations for creation

action.description: The action defined by RBAC, refer https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/role-based-access-control/role-definitions#actions-format

scope.description: The scope of the operation, refer https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/role-based-access-control/scope-overview

actionName.description: The name of action for you dryrun job.

DryrunPatch.description: a dryrun job to be updated.

properties.description: The properties of the dryrun job.

DryrunProperties.description: The properties of the dryrun job

operationPreviews.description: the preview of the operations for creation

properties.description: The properties of the dryrun job.

EasyAuthMicrosoftEntraIDAuthInfo.description: The authentication info when authType is EasyAuth Microsoft Entra ID

clientId.description: Application clientId for EasyAuth Microsoft Entra ID.

secret.description: Application Secret for EasyAuth Microsoft Entra ID.

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation when Linker is updating or deleting

FabricPlatform.description: The service properties when target service type is FabricPlatform

FirewallRules.description: Target service's firewall rules. to allow connections from source service.

ipRanges.description: This value specifies the set of IP addresses or IP address ranges in CIDR form to be included as the allowed list of client IPs for a given database account.

azureServices.description: Allow Azure services to access the target service if true.

callerClientIP.description: Allow caller client IP to access the target service if true. the property is used when connecting local application to target service.

KeyVaultSecretReferenceSecretInfo.description: The secret info when type is keyVaultSecretReference. It's for scenario that user provides a secret stored in user's keyvault and source is Azure Kubernetes. The key Vault's resource id is linked to secretStore.keyVaultId.

name.description: Name of the Key Vault secret.

version.description: Version of the Key Vault secret.

KeyVaultSecretUriSecretInfo.description: The secret info when type is keyVaultSecretUri. It's for scenario that user provides a secret stored in user's keyvault and source is Web App, Spring Cloud or Container App.

LinkerConfigurationType.description: Type of configuration to determine whether the configuration can be modified after creation. KeyvaultSecret means the configuration references a key vault secret, such as App Service/ACA key vault reference. Default means the configuration is real value, such as user name, raw secret, etc.

secretStore.description: An option to store secret value in secure place

configurationInfo.description: The connection information consumed by applications, including secrets, connection strings.

LinkerResource.description: Linker of source and target resource

recommendedRole.description: The recommended role to resolve permissions missing

PublicNetworkSolution.description: Indicates public network solution, include firewall rules

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation(such as firewall rules) when Linker is updating or deleting

action.description: Indicates how to apply the connector operations, such as opt out network configuration, opt in configuration.

firewallRules.description: Describe firewall rules of target service to make sure source application could connect to the target.

value.description: The LinkerResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SecretAuthInfo.description: The authentication info when authType is secret

name.description: Username or account name for secret auth.

secretInfo.description: Password or key vault secret for secret auth.

SecretStore.description: An option to store secret value in secure place

keyVaultId.description: The key vault id to store secret

keyVaultSecretName.description: The key vault secret name to store secret, only valid when storing one secret

SelfHostedServer.description: The service properties when target service type is SelfHostedServer

ServicePrincipalCertificateAuthInfo.description: The authentication info when authType is servicePrincipal certificate

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation when Linker is updating or deleting

roles.description: Optional, this value specifies the Azure roles to be assigned. Automatically

ServicePrincipalSecretAuthInfo.description: The authentication info when authType is servicePrincipal secret

userName.description: Username created in the database which is mapped to a user in AAD.

clientId.description: ServicePrincipal application clientId for servicePrincipal auth.

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation when Linker is updating or deleting

roles.description: Optional, this value specifies the Azure roles to be assigned. Automatically

SourceConfiguration.description: A configuration item for source resource

keyVaultReferenceIdentity.description: The identity for key vault reference, system or user-assigned managed identity ID

SystemAssignedIdentityAuthInfo.description: The authentication info when authType is systemAssignedIdentity

userName.description: Username created in the database which is mapped to a user in AAD.

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation when Linker is updating or deleting

roles.description: Optional, this value specifies the Azure role to be assigned

UserAccountAuthInfo.description: The authentication info when authType is user account

userName.description: Username created in the database which is mapped to a user in AAD.

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation when Linker is updating or deleting

roles.description: Optional, this value specifies the Azure roles to be assigned. Automatically

UserAssignedIdentityAuthInfo.description: The authentication info when authType is userAssignedIdentity

userName.description: Username created in the database which is mapped to a user in AAD.

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation when Linker is updating or deleting

roles.description: Optional, this value specifies the Azure role to be assigned

deleteOrUpdateBehavior.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation when Linker is updating or deleting

ValidateOperationResult.description: The validation operation result for a Linker.

ValidateResult.description: The validation result for a Linker.

isConnectionAvailable.description: A boolean value indicating whether the connection is available or not

reportStartTimeUtc.description: The start time of the validation report.

reportEndTimeUtc.description: The end time of the validation report.

sourceId.description: The resource id of the Linker source application.

targetId.description: The resource Id of target service.

ValidationResultItem.description: The validation item for a Linker.

description.description: The display name of validation item

errorMessage.description: The error message of validation result

errorCode.description: The error code of validation result

ValueSecretInfo.description: The secret info when type is rawValue. It's for scenarios that user input the secret.

value.description: The actual value of the secret.
